name: Office Offense: no chair edition
description:
A work for the Esa St-luc.

Commands: left click : fire,    z or up: go faster ,   s: go slower.

Actually the game is develeped to be played with a custom chair, but i can't put a real chair on the internet, so it's a "pc version".

I dont own the music, its two different remix from running in the 90s (links below).

And i made the title screen with the super 80's logo generator also in the links below.

https://photofunia.com/fr/effe...
